data.title: CBC Media Centre
data.text: Eli Glasner is the award-winning senior entertainment reporter for CBC News Network and screentime columnist for CBC radio. In addition to reporting on arts and culture and reviewing the latest releases, he's hosted CBC radio's Q, Day 6, CBC Toronto's Metro Morning, Here and Now and more. Viola Davis, Margaret Atwood, Tom Cruise, David Cronenberg and C-3PO (Anthony Daniels) are just a few of the famous faces he's interviewed. Powered by a deeply felt appreciation of the arts, Glasner's mission is to curate great conversations and use entertainment as a mirror for our changing world.
